entry.title: facmartoni/bom: The Browser Orchestration Microservice (BOM) is a lightweight microservice designed to manage the lifecycle of browser instances for web scraping tasks. Built with Puppeteer and Express.js, BOM optimizes resource usage by dynamically creating, allocating, and destroying headless browser instances.
entry.content: The Browser Orchestration Microservice (BOM) is a lightweight microservice designed to manage the lifecycle of browser instances for web scraping tasks. Built with Puppeteer and Express.js, BOM optimizes resource usage by dynamically creating, allocating, and destroying headless browser instances.
